trans-unit.source: Paths can also be simplified by using cleanPath() to remove redundant "/" and ".." elements.

trans-unit.source: Paths containing "." elements that reference the current directory at that point in the path, ".." elements that reference the parent directory, and symbolic links can be reduced to a canonical form using the canonicalPath() function.
trans-unit.target: 包含“。”的路径 使用路径canonicalPath（）将引用当前目录的元素，引用父目录的“ ..”元素和符号链接简化为规范形式。

trans-unit.source: Paths specified by the QML2_IMPORT_PATH environment variable

Paths to files and directories within a directory can be constructed using filePath() and absoluteFilePath(). The filePath() function returns a path to the specified file or directory relative to the path of the QDir object; absoluteFilePath() returns an absolute path to the specified file or directory. Neither of these functions checks for the existence of files or directory; they only construct paths.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用filePath（）和absoluteFilePath（）构造目录中文件和目录的路径。的文件路径（）函数返回到指定的文件或目录相对于所述的路径的路径的QDir对象; absoluteFilePath（）返回指定文件或目录的绝对路径。这些功能都不检查文件或目录的存在；他们只构造路径。

Neither of these functions checks for the existence of files or directory; they only construct paths.

trans-unit.source: Peek from the beginning of the buffered native event queue. A peeker id is optional with PeekDefault. If a peeker id is provided to peekEventQueue() when using PeekDefault, then peeking starts from the beginning of the queue, not from the cached index; thus, this can be used to manually reset a cached index to peek from the start of the queue. When this operation completes, the associated index will be updated to the new position in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 从缓冲的本机事件队列的开头窥视。 PeekDefault的peeker ID是可选的。如果在使用PeekDefault时将peeker ID提供给peekEventQueue（），则peeking从队列的开头开始，而不是从缓存的索引开始；因此，这可用于手动重置缓存的索引，以便从队列开始处窥视。此操作完成后，关联的索引将更新到队列中的新位置。

Peer certificates are checked automatically during the handshake phase. This function is normally used to fetch certificates for display, or for performing connection diagnostics. Certificates contain information about the peer and the certificate issuers, including host name, issuer names, and issuer public keys.

性能方面的考虑和建议

trans-unit.source: Performance gained from using OpenGL to accelerate series drawing depends on the underlying hardware, but in most cases it is significant. For example, on a standard desktop computer, enabling OpenGL acceleration for a series typically allows rendering at least a hundred times more points without reduction on the frame rate. Chart size also has less effect on the frame rate.
trans-unit.target: 使用OpenGL加速系列绘图所获得的性能取决于底层硬件,但在大多数情况下,性能是显著的。例如,在标准的台式电脑上,启用OpenGL加速系列通常可以在不降低帧率的情况下多渲染至少一百倍的点。图表大小对帧率的影响也较小。

trans-unit.source: Performance gained from using OpenGL to accelerate series drawing depends on the underlying hardware, but in most cases it is significant. For example, on a standard desktop computer, enabling OpenGL acceleration for a series typically allows rendering at least hundred times more points without reduction on the frame rate. Chart size also has less effect on the frame rate. The biggest performance sink when rendering ChartView is rendering and uploading the underlying chart texture. If the underlying chart itself is not changing rapidly, significant extra performance is gained from not needing to regenerate the chart texture for each frame.
trans-unit.target: 使用OpenGL加速系列绘图所获得的性能取决于基础硬件，但是在大多数情况下，这是非常重要的。例如，在标准台式计算机上，对系列启用OpenGL加速通常可以在不降低帧速率的情况下渲染至少一百倍的点。图表大小对帧速率的影响也较小。渲染ChartView时，最大的性能下降是渲染和上传基础的图表纹理。如果基础图表本身并没有快速变化，则无需为每一帧重新生成图表纹理，即可获得显着的额外性能。

trans-unit.source: Performance of a MapQuickItem is normally in the same ballpark as the contained Qt Quick item alone. Overheads added amount to a translation and (possibly) scaling of the original item, as well as a transformation from longitude and latitude to screen position.
trans-unit.target: 通常，MapQuickItem的性能与单独包含的Qt Quick项的性能相同。开销增加了原始项目的翻译和（可能）缩放，以及从经度和纬度到屏幕位置的转换。

trans-unit.source: Performance of a MapQuickItem is normally in the same ballpark as the contained Qt Quick item alone. Overheads added amount to a translation and (possibly) scaling of the original item, as well as a transformation from longitude and latitude to screen position.
trans-unit.target: MapQuickItem 的性能通常与单独包含的 Qt Quick 项目的性能相同。增加的开销相当于原始项目的翻译和(可能)缩放,以及从经度和纬度到屏幕位置的转换。

trans-unit.source: Performance optimization for large amounts of data

Performance-wise, the general expectation is a somewhat lower CPU usage compared to OpenGL, due to lower driver overhead, and a higher GPU utilization with less idle time wastage. The backend doesn't heavily utilize threads yet, which means there are opportunities for further improvements in the future, for example to further optimize image loading.
trans-unit.target: 性能方面,由于驱动开销较低,一般预期CPU使用率比OpenGL低一些,GPU使用率较高,空闲时间浪费较少。后台还没有大量利用线程,这意味着未来还有进一步改进的机会,比如进一步优化图像加载。

trans-unit.source: Perspective camera is the standard camera type, which uses field of view and near and far clip planes to specify the projection.
trans-unit.target: 透视摄像机是标准的摄像机类型,它使用视场和远近夹平面来指定投影。

trans-unit.source: PerspectiveCamera is the standard Camera type. It gives a realistic projection of the scene, where distant objects are perceived as smaller. The frustum is defined by the fieldOfView property as well as near and far clip planes.
trans-unit.target: PerspectiveCamera是标准的Camera类型。它给出了场景的逼真的投影，其中远处的物体被认为更小。视锥由fieldOfView属性以及近和远修剪平面定义。

trans-unit.source: Phone Alert Status UUID (service). The service exposes the phone alert status when in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 电话告警状态UUID(服务)。服务在连接中时,会暴露出电话告警状态。
电话簿访问配置文件(PBAP)UUID(服务)

trans-unit.source: Physical resolution obtained by dividing the size of the monitor by the number of pixels.
trans-unit.target: 用显示器的尺寸除以像素数获得的物理分辨率。

trans-unit.source: Pick queries are performed on mouse press and mouse release. If drag is enabled, queries also happen on each mouse move while any button is pressed. If hover is enabled, queries happen on every mouse move even if no button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标按下和松开时都会进行选取查询。如果启用了拖动功能,则在每次鼠标移动时,即使没有按下任何按钮,也会进行查询。如果启用悬停,即使没有按下按钮,每次鼠标移动都会发生查询。

trans-unit.source: PickEvent holds information when an object is picked. This is received as a parameter in most of the QObjectPicker component signals when picking succeeds. More...
trans-unit.target: PickEvent会在拾取对象时保存信息。拾取成功后，将在大多数QObjectPicker组件信号中将其作为参数接收。更多的...

trans-unit.source: PickLineEvent holds information when a segment of a line is picked. More...
trans-unit.target: PickLineEvent在选择线段时保存信息。更多的...

trans-unit.source: PickPointEvent holds information when a segment of a point cloud is picked. More...
trans-unit.target: PickPointEvent会在点云的一部分被拾取时保存信息。更多的...

trans-unit.source: PickTriangleEvent holds information when a triangle is picked. More...
trans-unit.target: PickTriangleEvent会在拾取三角形时保存信息。更多的...

trans-unit.source: Picking can be an expensive operation, especially if the mesh has a lot of vertices. PickProxy can be used to provide an alternative geometry, usually with fewer primitives, which will be used for picking, while the GeometryRenderer instance will be used for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 拾取可能是一项昂贵的操作，尤其是在网格具有很多顶点的情况下。PickProxy可用于提供替代几何图形，通常具有较少的图元，这些几何图形将用于拾取，而GeometryRenderer实例将用于渲染。

trans-unit.source: Picking can be an expensive operation, especially if the mesh has a lot of vertices. QPickProxy can be used to provide an alternative geometry, usually with fewer primitives, which will be used for picking, while the GeometryRenderer instance will be used for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 拾取可能是一项昂贵的操作，尤其是在网格具有很多顶点的情况下。QPickProxy可用于提供替代的几何体，通常具有较少的基元，这些几何体将用于拾取，而GeometryRenderer实例将用于渲染。

trans-unit.source: Picking is the process of sending a ray through the scene from some starting position to find which model(s) intersects with the ray. In QtQuick3D the ray is normally sent from the view using 2D coordinates resulting from a touch or mouse event. If a model was hit by the ray a PickResult will be returned with a handle to the model and information about where the ray hit the model. For models that use custom geometry the picking is less accurate then for static mesh data, as picking is only done against the models bounding volume. If the ray goes through more then one model, the closest pickable model is selected.
trans-unit.target: 拾取是从某个开始位置通过场景发送光线以查找与光线相交的模型的过程。在QtQuick3D中，光线通常是使用触摸或鼠标事件产生的2D坐标从视图发送的。如果模型被射线击中，则将返回PickResult并附带模型的句柄以及有关射线在何处击中模型的信息。对于使用自定义几何的模型，拾取的准确性不如静态网格数据，因为拾取仅针对模型的边界体积。如果光线经过一个以上的模型，则选择最接近的可拾取模型。

trans-unit.source: Picture displays icons in a scalable vector format. It can also colorize the icons via the color property.
trans-unit.target: 图片以可缩放的矢量格式显示图标。它还可以通过color属性为图标着色。

trans-unit.source: Pictures can also be drawn using play(). Some basic data about a picture is available, for example, size(), isNull() and boundingRect().
trans-unit.target: 图片也可以使用play（）绘制。提供了有关图片的一些基本数据，例如size（），isNull（）和boundingRect（）。

trans-unit.source: Pie size and position on the chart are controlled by using relative values that range from 0.0 to 1.0. These relate to the actual chart rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 饼的大小和在图表上的位置通过使用范围在0.0到1.0的相对值来控制。这些与实际的图表矩形有关。

trans-unit.source: PieMenu can be displayed at any position on the screen. With a traditional context menu, the menu would be positioned with its top left corner at the position of the right click, but since PieMenu is radial, we position it centered over the position of the right click.
trans-unit.target: PieMenu可以显示在屏幕上的任何位置。如果是传统的上下文菜单,菜单的左上角会被定位在右键点击的位置,但由于PieMenu是径向的,我们将其定位在右键点击位置的中心。

trans-unit.source: PieMenuStyle is a style for PieMenu that draws each section of the menu as a filled "slice".
trans-unit.target: PieMenuStyle是PieMenu的一种样式，它将菜单的每个部分绘制为填充的“切片”。

trans-unit.source: PinchArea can be used in two ways:
trans-unit.target: PinchArea可以通过两种方式使用。

trans-unit.source: PinchHandler is a handler that interprets a multi-finger gesture to interactively rotate, zoom, and drag an Item. Like other Input Handlers, by default it is fully functional, and manipulates its target, which is the Item within which it is declared.
trans-unit.target: PinchHandler是一个处理程序，该处理程序解释多指手势以交互方式旋转，缩放和拖动Item。像其他输入处理程序一样，默认情况下，它具有全部功能，并操纵其target，即在其中声明它的Item。

trans-unit.source: Pixel density is measured in Dots per Inch (DPI) or Pixels per Inch (PPI), and is determined by the number of display pixels and their size. Consequently, the number of pixels alone isn't enough to determine if a display falls into the high-DPI category.
trans-unit.target: 像素密度以每英寸点数(DPI)或每英寸像素(PPI)为单位,由显示器像素的数量及其大小决定。因此,仅凭像素数并不足以确定显示器是否属于高DPI类别。

trans-unit.source: Pixel luminance curves of the above images.
trans-unit.target: 上述图像的像素亮度曲线。

trans-unit.target: 像素解压缩缓冲区对象，用于将像素数据写入OpenGL服务器（例如，使用 glTexImage2D() ）。在OpenGL / ES下不受支持。

trans-unit.target: 来自前台源的像素值被从源中减去并写入。

trans-unit.source: Pixel values are derived directly from the RGB values, also known as "True Color."
trans-unit.target: 像素值直接来源于RGB值,也就是所谓的 "真彩色"。

trans-unit.source: Pixel values represent indexes into a list of available colors, i.e. QColormap uses the index of the color that most closely matches an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 像素值将索引表示为可用颜色的列表，即QColormap使用最接近RGB值的颜色的索引。

trans-unit.source: Pixel values represent indexes into a vector of available colors, i.e. QColormap uses the index of the color that most closely matches an RGB value.
trans-unit.target: 像素值将索引表示为可用颜色的向量，即QColormap使用最接近RGB值的颜色的索引。

trans-unit.source: Pixels per second that objects will be accelerated by.
trans-unit.target: 物体每秒加速的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Pixels used by application (user space), subject to scaling by the operating system or Qt.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用的像素(用户空间),受操作系统或Qt缩放的影响。

Pixmaps can also be set for a specific page using QWizardPage::setPixmap().
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用QWizardPage :: setPixmap（）为特定页面设置Pixmap。

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用QWizard :: setPixmap（）为整个向导设置像素图，在这种情况下，它们适用于所有未指定像素图的页面。

trans-unit.source: Place metadata is provided by a supplier who may require that an attribution message be displayed to the user when the place details are viewed.
trans-unit.target: 位置元数据由供应商提供，该供应商可能要求在查看位置详细信息时向用户显示归因消息。

trans-unit.source: Place objects are typically obtained from a search model and will generally only have their basic properties set. The detailsFetched property can be used to test if further property values need to be fetched from the Plugin. This can be done by invoking the getDetails() method. Progress of the fetching operation can be monitored with the status property, which will be set to Place.Fetching when the details are being fetched.
trans-unit.target: 位置对象通常是从搜索模型中获得的，通常只设置其基本属性。所述detailsFetched如果进一步属性值需要从所取出的属性可以被用来测试插件。这可以通过调用getDetails（）方法来完成。可以使用status属性监视获取操作的进度，状态属性将在获取详细信息时设置为Place.Fetching。

trans-unit.source: Place painting code into the onPaint handler and trigger painting by calling the markDirty() or requestPaint() methods.
trans-unit.target: 将绘画代码放入 onPaint 处理程序中，并通过调用markDirty（）或requestPaint（）方法来触发绘画。

trans-unit.source: Place the call but don't wait for the reply (the reply's contents will be discarded).
trans-unit.target: 拨打电话,但不要等待回复(回复的内容会被丢弃)。

trans-unit.source: Place the computation code in a .js script and attach it to a WorkerScript instance. Call WorkerScript.sendMessage() to start the computation in a new thread. Let the script call sendMessage() too, to pass the result back to the GUI thread. Handle the result in onMessage and update the GUI there.
trans-unit.target: 将计算代码放在 .js 脚本中，并将其附加到WorkerScript实例。调用WorkerScript.sendMessage（）以在新线程中开始计算。让脚本也调用sendMessage（），以将结果传递回GUI线程。在 onMessage 中处理结果并在那里更新GUI。

trans-unit.source: Place the computation code in a .js script and attach it to a WorkerScript instance. Call WorkerScript.sendMessage() to start the computation in a new thread. Let the script call sendMessage() too, to pass the result back to the GUI thread. Handle the result in onMessage and update the GUI there.
trans-unit.target: 将计算代码放在 .js 脚本中，并将其附加到WorkerScript实例。调用WorkerScript.sendMessage（）以在新线程中开始计算。让脚本也调用sendMessage（），以将结果传递回GUI线程。在 onMessage 中处理结果并在那里更新GUI。

trans-unit.source: PlaceSearchModel provides a model of place search results within the searchArea. The searchTerm and categories properties can be set to restrict the search results to places matching those criteria.
trans-unit.target: PlaceSearchModel在searchArea中提供位置搜索结果的模型。的SEARCHTERM和类别属性可以被设置为限制搜索结果，以符合这些条件的场所。

trans-unit.source: Placement of the focus bar in normalized coordinates. Range is [0...1]. 0.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: 聚焦条在标准化坐标中的放置。范围是 [0...1] 。默认 0.5 。

trans-unit.source: Places a call to the remote method specified by
trans-unit.target: 调用对远程方法的调用。

trans-unit.source: Places a marker in the OpenGL command queue for the GPU to record the timestamp when this marker is reached by the GPU. This function is non-blocking and the result will become available at some later time.
trans-unit.target: 在OpenGL命令队列中为GPU放置一个标记,当GPU到达该标记时记录时间戳。该函数是非阻塞性的,其结果将在稍后的某个时间可用。

trans-unit.source: Places and categories may be saved and removed. It is possible for notifications to be given when this happens.
trans-unit.target: 可保存和删除位置和类别。当发生这种情况时,有可能会发出通知。

trans-unit.source: Places and categories with DeviceVisibility are only stored on the local device.
trans-unit.target: 具有DeviceVisibility的位置和类别仅存储在本地设备上。

trans-unit.source: Places and categories with PrivateVisibility are only visible to the current user. The data may be stored either locally or on a remote service or both.
trans-unit.target: 具有PrivateVisibility的地点和类别只对当前用户可见。数据可以存储在本地,也可以存储在远程服务上,或者两者兼而有之。

trans-unit.source: Places and categories with PublicVisibility are visible to everyone.
trans-unit.target: 具有 PublicVisibility 的地方和类别对每个人都是可见的。

trans-unit.source: Places can be classified as belonging to different categories. The manager supports access to these categories.
trans-unit.target: 场所可以被分类为属于不同的类别。管理员支持对这些类别的访问。

trans-unit.source: Places from another manager that may have corresponding/matching places in the current manager are assigned using setPlaces() or setResults(). A set of further parameters are specified which determines the criteria for matching.
trans-unit.target: 使用setPlaces（）或setResults（）可以分配来自另一个管理器的位置，该位置可能在当前管理器中具有对应/匹配的位置。指定了一组其他参数，这些参数确定匹配的标准。

trans-unit.source: Places have a field for a rich text attribution string. Some providers may require that the attribution be shown when a place is displayed to a user.
trans-unit.target: 地方有一个富文本归属字符串的字段。有些提供者可能会要求在向用户显示一个地方时显示归属。

trans-unit.source: Places have an associated icon which can be used to represent a place on a map or to decorate a delegate in a view.
trans-unit.target: 位置具有关联的图标，该图标可用于表示地图上的位置或装饰视图中的代表。

trans-unit.source: Places may have additional attributes which are not covered in the formal API. Similar to contacts attributes are based around a common set of attribute types. To retrieve an extended attribute one would do:
trans-unit.target: 地点可能具有正式API中未涵盖的其他属性。与联系人相似，属性基于一组通用的属性类型。要检索扩展属性，可以这样做：

trans-unit.source: Places may have additional attributes which are not covered in the formal API. The extendedAttributes property provides access to these. The type of extended attributes available is specific to each Plugin.
trans-unit.target: 地点可能具有正式API中未涵盖的其他属性。该extendedAttributes属性提供这些服务。可用的扩展属性的类型特定于每个插件。

trans-unit.source: Places may have additional rich content associated with them. The currently supported rich content include editorial descriptions, reviews and images. These are exposed as a set of models for retrieving the content. Editorial descriptions of the place are available from the editorialModel property. Reviews of the place are available from the reviewModel property. A gallery of pictures of the place can be accessed using the imageModel property.
trans-unit.target: 地方可能有与之相关的其他丰富内容。当前支持的丰富内容包括社论描述，评论和图像。这些作为一组用于检索内容的模型公开。这个地方的编辑说明可从editorialModel财产。可从reviewModel属性获得该地点的评论。可以使用imageModel属性访问该地点的图片库。

trans-unit.source: Places the selected objects in a form layout.
trans-unit.target: 将选定的对象放置在表格布局中。

trans-unit.source: Places the selected objects in a grid layout.
trans-unit.target: 将选定的对象放置在网格布局中。

trans-unit.source: Places the selected objects in a horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 将所选对象置于水平布局中。

trans-unit.source: Places the selected objects in a vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 将所选对象置于垂直布局中。

trans-unit.source: Plain Old Data (POD) is a term to describe a simple data collection, along the lines of a C++ struct. For example, if you have an API for a phonebook, you may want to use the concept of an "address" in its interface (where address might include street, city, state, country, and postal code). You can use the POD keyword to define objects like this, which can then be used by in PROP/SIGNAL/SLOT definitions in your class definitions.
trans-unit.target: Plain Old Data (POD)是一个描述简单数据集合的术语,类似于C++结构体。例如,如果你有一个电话簿的API,你可能想在它的接口中使用 "地址 "的概念(其中地址可能包括街道、城市、州、国家和邮政编码)。你可以使用POD关键字来定义这样的对象,然后可以在你的类定义中的PROP/SIGNAL/SLOT定义中使用。

trans-unit.source: Platform headers can be used in conjunction with QGuiApplication::platformFunction() to give a type safe interface to platform specific functionality. It is possible for headers defined in QtPlatformHeaders to define typedefs for functions that can be returned by a platform plugin from QGuiApplication::platformFunction(). Headers in QtPlatformHeaders can also implement wrapper functions for the function pointer, giving a static function that can be called from any context after the platform integration has been created. An implementation of this pattern is QXcbWindowFunctions::setWmWindowType(). This function retrieves a function pointer from QGuiApplication::platformFunction, and executes that function if the requested function was returned.
trans-unit.target: 平台标头可以与QGuiApplication :: platformFunction（）结合使用，以为平台特定功能提供类型安全的接口。QtPlatformHeaders中定义的标头可以为可以由QGuiApplication :: platformFunction（）的平台插件返回的函数定义typedef 。QtPlatformHeaders中的标头还可以为函数指针实现包装函数，从而提供一个静态函数，可以在创建平台集成后从任何上下文中调用该函数。此模式的实现是QXcbWindowFunctions :: setWmWindowType（）。该函数从QGuiApplication :: platformFunction检索函数指针，如果返回了所请求的函数，则执行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Platform headers can be used in conjunction with QGuiApplication::platformFunction() to give a type safe interface to platform specific functionality. It is possible for headers defined in QtPlatformHeaders to define typedefs for functions that can be returned by a platform plugin from QGuiApplication::platformFunction(). Headers in QtPlatformHeaders can also implement wrapper functions for the function pointer, giving a static function that can be called from any context after the platform integration has been created. An implementation of this pattern is QXcbWindowFunctions::setWmWindowType(). This function retrieves a function pointer from QGuiApplication::platformFunction, and executes that function if the requested function was returned.
trans-unit.target: 平台标头可以与QGuiApplication :: platformFunction（）结合使用，以为平台特定功能提供类型安全的接口。QtPlatformHeaders中定义的标头可以为可以由QGuiApplication :: platformFunction（）的平台插件返回的函数定义typedef 。QtPlatformHeaders中的标头还可以为函数指针实现包装函数，从而提供一个静态函数，该静态函数可以在创建平台集成后从任何上下文中调用。此模式的实现是QXcbWindowFunctions :: setWmWindowType（）。该函数从QGuiApplication :: platformFunction检索函数指针，如果返回了所请求的函数，则执行该函数。

trans-unit.source: Platform-specific variables follow the naming pattern of the variables which they extend or modify, but include the name of the relevant platform in their name. For example, a makespec may use QMAKE_LIBS to specify a list of libraries that each project needs to link against, and QMAKE_LIBS_X11 would be used to extend this list.
trans-unit.target: 特定于平台的变量遵循其扩展或修改的变量的命名模式，但在其名称中包括相关平台的名称。例如，makespec可以使用 QMAKE_LIBS 来指定每个项目需要链接的库列表，并且 QMAKE_LIBS_X11 将用于扩展此列表。

trans-unit.source: Platforms that do not support both NDEF data and file content sharing modes can return the supported subset in the supportedShareModes() method. Applications that call setShareModes() with an unsupported mode will receive an error signal with a UnsupportedShareModeError.

trans-unit.source: Playback can start or resume only when the buffer is entirely filled, in which case the status is MediaPlayer.Buffered or MediaPlayer.Buffering. A value lower than 1.0 implies that the status is MediaPlayer.Stalled.

trans-unit.source: Playback has reached the end of the current media. The player is in the StoppedState.

trans-unit.source: Playback of the current media has stalled due to insufficient buffering or some other temporary interruption. The player is in the PlayingState or PausedState.
trans-unit.target: 由于缓冲不足或某些其他临时中断，当前媒体的播放已停止。玩家处于PlayingState或PausedState。

trans-unit.source: Playback starts from the current and moves through each successive item until the last is reached and then stops. The next item is a null item when the last one is currently playing.
trans-unit.target: 从当前开始播放,并在每个连续的项目中移动,直到达到最后一个项目,然后停止。当当前正在播放最后一个项目时,下一个项目为空项目。

trans-unit.source: Please note that this behavior is different to how QSettings behaved in versions of Qt prior to Qt 6. INI files written with Qt 5 or earlier aree however fully readable by a Qt 6 based application (unless a ini codec different from utf8 had been set). But INI files written with Qt 6 will only be readable by older Qt versions if you set the "iniCodec" to a utf-8 textcodec.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此行为与Qt 6之前的Qt版本中的QSettings行为不同。但是，基于Qt 6的应用程序可以完全读取使用Qt 5或更早版本编写的INI文件（除非已设置与utf8不同的ini编解码器） 。但是，如果将“ iniCodec”设置为utf-8文本编解码器，则用Qt 6编写的INI文件只能由较旧的Qt版本读取。

trans-unit.source: Please note that unlike the Scenegraph which is composed of Entities and Components, the framegraph is only composed of nested nodes which are all subclasses of Qt3DRender::QFrameGraphNode. This is because the framegraph nodes are not simulated objects in our virtual world, but rather supporting information.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，与由实体和组件组成的场景图不同，框架图仅由嵌套节点组成，这些节点都是Qt3DRender :: QFrameGraphNode的子类。这是因为框架图节点不是我们虚拟世界中的模拟对象，而是支持信息。

trans-unit.source: Please note that using a WorkerScript element will result in a separate JavaScript engine being created (as the JavaScript engine is per-thread). This will result in increased memory usage. Multiple WorkerScript elements will all use the same worker thread, however, so the memory impact of using a second or third WorkerScript element is negligible once an application already uses one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用WorkerScript元素将导致创建单独的JavaScript引擎（因为JavaScript引擎是基于线程的）。这将导致内存使用量增加。但是，多个WorkerScript元素都将使用同一个工作线程，因此，一旦应用程序已经使用第二个或第三个WorkerScript元素，则对内存的影响可以忽略不计。

trans-unit.source: Please note that using a WorkerScript element will result in a separate JavaScript engine being created (as the JavaScript engine is per-thread). This will result in increased memory usage. Multiple WorkerScript elements will all use the same worker thread, however, so the memory impact of using a second or third WorkerScript element is negligible once an application already uses one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用WorkerScript元素将导致创建单独的JavaScript引擎（因为JavaScript引擎是基于线程的）。这将导致内存使用量增加。但是，多个WorkerScript元素都将使用相同的工作线程，因此，一旦应用程序已经使用第二个或第三个WorkerScript元素，则对内存的影响可以忽略不计。

trans-unit.source: Please note there are some subtleties here. A CONSTANT PROP has a Q_PROPERTY declared as CONSTANT on the SOURCE side. However, replicas cannot know the correct value until they are initialized, which means the property value has to be allowed to change during initialization. For READONLY, the source will have neither a setter nor a push slot, and the replica side will not have a push slot generated. Adding the PERSISTED trait to a PROP will have the PROP use the QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore instance set on a Node (if any) to save/restore PROP values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这里有一些微妙之处。CONSTANT PROP 在源端具有Q_PROPERTY声明为CONSTANT。但是，副本在初始化之前无法知道正确的值，这意味着必须在初始化期间更改属性值。对于READONLY，源将既没有设置器也没有推槽，而复制方将不会生成推槽。将PERSISTED特征添加到PROP将使PROP使用在节点上设置的QRemoteObjectAbstractPersistedStore实例（如果有）来保存/恢复PROP值。

插件的具体行为和限制。

trans-unit.source: Plugin writers and application developers may provide types defined as QML documents. A QML document, when visible to the QML import system, defines a type identified by the name of the file minus the file extensions.
trans-unit.target: 插件编写者和应用程序开发人员可以提供定义为QML文档的类型。当QML文档在QML导入系统中可见时,它定义的类型由文件名减去文件扩展名来标识。
插件和进口 特殊注意事项

trans-unit.source: Plugins are also available as IMPORTED targets in CMake. The Qt Network, Qt SQL, Qt GUI, and Qt Widgets modules have plugins associated. They provide a list of plugins in the Qt5
trans-unit.target: 插件也可用作CMake中的 IMPORTED 目标。在Qt的网络，Qt的SQL，Qt的图形用户界面，以及Qt控件模块都有相关的插件。他们提供了 Qt5 中的插件列表

trans-unit.source: Plugins are built using the lib template, as described in the previous section. This tells qmake to generate a Makefile for the project that will build a plugin in a suitable form for each platform, usually in the form of a library. As with ordinary libraries, the VERSION variable is used to specify information about the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如上一节所述，使用 lib 模板构建插件。这告诉qmake为项目生成一个Makefile，该文件将以适合每种平台的形式（通常以库的形式）构建插件。与普通库一样，VERSION变量用于指定有关插件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Plugins can be linked statically into your application. If you build the static version of Qt, this is the only option for including Qt's predefined plugins. Using static plugins makes the deployment less error-prone, but has the disadvantage that no functionality from plugins can be added without a complete rebuild and redistribution of the application.
trans-unit.target: 插件可以静态地链接到你的应用程序中。如果你构建的是Qt的静态版本,这是包含Qt预定义插件的唯一选择。使用静态插件使部署不容易出错,但有一个缺点,那就是在没有完全重建和重新分发应用程序的情况下,不能添加插件的功能。

trans-unit.source: Plugins recognized by the system have a name property, a simple string normally indicating the name of the service that the Plugin retrieves data from. They also have a variety of features, which can be test for using the supportsRouting(), supportsGeocoding(), supportsMapping(), supportsPlaces() and supportsNavigation() methods.
trans-unit.target: 系统识别的插件具有name属性，这是一个简单的字符串，通常指示该插件从中检索数据的服务的名称。它们还具有多种功能，可以测试是否使用supportsRou​​ting（），supportsGeocoding（），supportsMapping（），supportsPlaces（）和supportsNavigation（）方法。

trans-unit.source: Point labels are not supported for accelerated series.
trans-unit.target: 加速系列不支持点标签。

trans-unit.source: Point-to-Point Protocol interfaces, establishing a direct connection between two nodes over a lower transport layer (often serial over radio or physical line).
trans-unit.target: 点对点协议接口,在两个节点之间通过较低的传输层(通常是通过无线电或物理线路的串行)建立直接连接。

trans-unit.source: PointHandler can be used to show feedback about a touchpoint or the mouse position, or to otherwise react to pointer events.
trans-unit.target: PointHandler可用于显示关于触摸点或鼠标位置的反馈,或以其他方式对指针事件做出反应。
